snippet: Andy Poss’s Alabama Rig lure was banned by organizers of the country’s two major bass fishing competitions because some professional anglers felt it could be too effective.
abstract: Some professional anglers say Alabama Rig, fishing lure invented by Andy Poss, makes it too easy to catch bass, so it has been banned from two major tournaments.
lead_paragraph: Andy Poss’s Alabama Rig lure was banned by organizers of the country’s two major bass fishing competitions because some professional anglers felt it could be too effective.

headline.seo: Alabama Rig Lure Makes It Easier to Entice Fish, but Some Anglers Say It's Too Easy
headline.main: A Fishing Lure So Effective, It Catches Criticism
headline.print_headline: Fish Are Hooked. Pros Are Not.
